summary: In Hinduism, Kali Yuga is the current and worst of the four ages, or *yugas*. It started around 3102 BCE and will last for 432,000 years. This age is known for its conflicts and sins. According to beliefs, it will end with a major event, restoring peace and beginning a new cycle with the *yuga* called Krita (Satya) Yuga.
title: Kali Yuga
